cause.description:
Indian television is kinda gettin borin,specially da cartoons..their so lame n plus all of em r bein aired in hindi..my cause is either start an indian version of southpark o atleast let sp b aired on indian channels.
1. We apparently hav very borin shows on tv...summin like southpark-india needs to b started..
cause.mission: Start an indian version of sp to b viewed by indian audiences
cause.name: InDiaN VeRsioN oF SouthPark
